articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag is preparing for Saturday's FA Cup final not knowing whether reports he will be sacked are true.

articles.description: Barcelona sack manager Xavi with former Bayern Munich boss Hansi Flick set to replace him.

articles.description: Sunrisers Hyderabad cruise into the final of the Indian Premier League with a comfortable 36-run win over Rajasthan Royals.

articles.description: Luka Doncic hits a three-pointer with three seconds left as the Dallas Mavericks take a 2-0 lead over the Minnesota Timberwolves in the Western Conference Finals.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Luka Doncic gives Dallas Mavericks 2-0 lead over Minnesota Timberwolves

articles.description: Wayne Rooney is expected to be confirmed as the head coach of Championship side Plymouth on Saturday after holding talks about the vacancy.
